title: Find the 'Stern Librarian' Ffion
content:
Proceed by inquiring about his son's identity, to which he responds with the name "Dolor." Continue by questioning the reason for his son's actions, and he reveals that he had discovered his son's hidden transgressions. Finally, query the nature of his son's secret, learning that his son had a penchant for taking lives.

Approach Mamzell Amira at Sharess' Caress at X:10 Y:82. She will deduce your purpose as related to Ffion and express sorrow for her absence. If you delve further into the matter
